name: flash-rolls-5e
description: A FoundryVTT module for handling roll requests between users

scripts.bump: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json ./src/module.json README.md && npm run build
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json ./src/module.json README.md && npm run build
scripts.bump:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json ./src/module.json README.md && npm run build
